portfolio.title: Portfolio website .M
portfolio.desc1: This is my first personal portfolio website. A website that in a way represents me, and showcases what I am all about. To build this website I used HTML, CSS (SCSS) and Angular framework. It is devided in different sections: short intro, about me, projects and get in touch. Each section has it's own characteristics. Project section showcases just the minimal description of a project and each card opens up a new page with full description of the project.

sections.title: Project section
sections.desc: Section to showcase projects done by me, as well as the projects that are on their way. Each card represents a different project and it is a link to a page that gives more info about the displayed project. To  make the section more suitable for the viewer each odd/even card is colored differently.

sections.title: About me section
sections.desc: About me section gives full details about the developer. It is a section that gives a chance to personaly get to know the author a little better. It contains the subsection to showcase all the technologies that the author enjoys learning and using to create applications.

sections.title: Project page
sections.desc: Project page gives a full description of the selected project. It showcases most of the project sections and describes their use, as well as it provides links to Github repository of the project and live demo links. This page includes mockup images of websites or aplications, as well as full list of technologies used to build it.

oggyportfolio.title: Portfolio website Oggy
oggyportfolio.desc1: This was the first project I worked on while learning Angular framework. I was inspired to do a personal portfolio presentation because I wanted the experience of making a personal website. All images used for this project are not my own property, but borrowed from the internet.

sections.title: Project section
sections.desc: Section to showcase projects done by me, as well as the projects that are on their way. Each card represents a different project and it is a link to a page that gives more info about the displayed project. To  make the section more suitable for the viewer each odd/even card is colored differently.

sections.title: About me section
sections.desc: About me section gives full details about the developer. It is a section that gives a chance to personaly get to know the author a little better. It contains the subsection to showcase all the technologies that the author enjoys learning and using to create applications.

sections.title: Project page
sections.desc: Project page gives a full description of the selected project. It showcases most of the project sections and describes their use, as well as it provides links to Github repository of the project and live demo links. This page includes mockup images of websites or aplications, as well as full list of technologies used to build it.

pophelanke.title: Pop helanke web shop
pophelanke.desc1: This project was a school project, done as an assignment while learning PHP and implementing JavaScript knowledge. The assignment was to build a website using an existing HTML and CSS theme and implementing Javascript functions as well as communication with Database via PHP.

sections.title: Index page
sections.desc: Index page is a typical home page for a webshop, showcasing offers, collections and categories to look through.

sections.title: Shop section
sections.desc: Shop section offers user a possibility to filter the leggings by the category, color or price. Each product can be added to cart, but the cart will be accessible only to logged in users. The items are shown in rows and each time a user decides on the filter new query is made, and the results are used to load new page contents.

sections.title: Shopping cart
sections.desc: Shopping cart page is accessible only to logged in users. The page gets populated with content once the user has some items placed in the cart. Here user can decide weather to delete some items from the cart or to keep them in the cart. If the user adds more items to the cart, there is a button for updating the cart so all items are updated.

viaolivia.title: Via Olivia web shop
viaolivia.desc1: This is a project I am currently working on. It is a webshop for different kinds of food products.

sections.title: Under construction page
sections.desc: This page is not an usual under construction page, but a page to let people know when the shop will be opened and give them an opportunity to subscribe to a newsletter and get notified once the shop is fully functioning or there are any other news. Mailerlite is implemented to be used as a newsletter subscription app.

stretchingapp.title: Stretching web app
stretchingapp.desc1: This is a project that is still in the planing phase. It will be a web app intended for everyone and anyone who wants to stretch their body. It will have easy step by step guides and follow along tutorials so that everyone is able to use it easily.
